comments.author: Roy T. Fielding
comments.body: This is an ongoing work item, but the most significant docs are fixed for 1.0.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: This is relatively well covered in the main parts of the site and documentation. Changing the issue to an ongoing task with no target release.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: I think we're pretty good on this one nowadays. Resolving as Fixed, let's deal with future branding issues on case by case basis.

description:
We need to consistently refer to our project (and product) as Apache Jackrabbit
on our site and docs, except where the context is obvious.
summary: Consistently refer to "Apache Jackrabbit" in docs and site
